Skill Notes:
Armor Skill Check Penalty: -1 Dex- and Str-based skills
Expert Acrobat: No light armor Acrobatics, Climb, Fly, Sleight Of Hand, or Stealth penalties/+2 Acrobatics and Fly in no armor
Keen Senses: +4 Perception
Sharp Senses: Increased Keen Senses effects
Small: +2 Fly/-4 Intimidate/+4 Stealth
Survivalist: Heal is a class skill/Survival is a class skill
Childlike: May take 10 on Bluff (appear innocent)/+2 Disguise (human child)
Eagle Eyes: Ignores -5 distance penalties on visual Perception
Go Unnoticed: May use Stealth to hide from flat-footed foes during first rd of combat
Pass For Human: +10 Disguise (pass as human); may take 10 on check
Second Chance (Rogue): May make -5 reroll on Acrobatics, Climb, or Fly 3/dy
Taunt: May use Bluff w/out size penalty to demoralize foes
Underfoot: +4 Acrobatics (move past larger foes w/out provoking AOO)
Well-Prepared: May use choice of Sleight Of Hand or Survival (DC 10 + GP cost) to produce required mundane item 1/dy
Combat
Hit Points: 77 Initiative: +2 Armor Class: 17 Attacks Per Round: 2 Base/Melee/Ranged Attack: +7/+8/+10 Combat Maneuver Bonus/Defense: +8/19
Armor Proficiency: Light Shield Proficiency: None Weapon Proficiency: Simple
Armor: Studded Leather Shield: None Weapons: Dart (+10 d3 x2@20 R20'); Greataxe (+4 d10 x3@20); Heavy Mace (+8 d6 x2@20); Light Mace (+10 d4 x2@20); Unarmed (+10 d2 x2@20)
Combat Notes:
Agile Maneuvers: +2 CMB
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +20
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +2
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +2
Dodge: +1 AC/+1 CMD
Nonproficient Weapon Penalty.Greataxe: -4 attack
Small: +1 AC/+1 Melee Attack/+1 Ranged Attack/-1 CMB/-1 CMD
Weapon Finesse: +2 light melee weapon attack (Dexterity instead of Strength)
Bleeding Attack: Sneak attack inflicts 5 HP/rd (magic healing or DC 15 Heal ends)
Crippling Strike: Sneak attack inflicts 2 points Strength damage
Improved Sidestep: May move normally on next rd after Sidestep
Improved Uncanny Dodge: Cannot be flanked, sneak attack only by rogue level 14+
Knock-Out Blow: May forego sneak attack damage to inflict unconscious for 1d4 rd (DC 15 Fort staggered 1 rd)
Low Profile: +1 AC vs. ranged
Mobility: +4 AC vs. movement AOO
Sidestep: May move 5' w/in threatened area w/out provoking AOO after foe miss; suffers -5' move next rd
Sneak Attack: Hit inflicts +5d6 HP when foe flanked or denied Dexterity bonus
Uncanny Dodge: Always adds Dexterity modifier to AC (foe feint neg)
Under And Over: May make immediate +2 trip maneuver w/out provoking AOO after larger foe grapple fails
Underfoot: +2 AC vs. AOO from moving through larger foe threat area
Warslinger: May reload a sling as a free action
Save: Fortitude: +6; Reflex: +10; Will: +5
Save Notes:
Constitution Fortitude Adjustment: +2
Dexterity Reflex Adjustment: +2
Halfling Luck: +1 Fortitude/+1 Reflex/+1 Will
Wisdom Will Adjustment: +1
Evasion: Reflex save in light or no armor yields no damage instead of half
Fearless: +2 vs. fear
Lucky Halfling: R30' May reroll ally saving throw 1/dy
